2019.question: Fossils of burrows and footprints are known as:
Which of the following is/are mode(s) of preservation of fossils? (Multiple Select Question)
options: Small organisms get trapped on viscous resins secreted by trees
Leaves preserved as thin films of carbon
Negative impressions of hard parts of organisms
Mineral growths that branch like ferns
answer: Small organisms get trapped on viscous resins secreted by trees
Leaves preserved as thin films of carbon
Negative impressions of hard parts of organisms
